nav.div: Martins Ferry City Schools » News » What's New » Coronavirus Information

img.p:
Martins Ferry City Schools is working closely with and following expert guidance from public health officials to ensure the safety of everyone in our school community. Please read the letter from Superintendent Jim Fogle that was sent home with students.
Please click below to access this important information:
Letter for Parents
